kpi.name: M1022C137

kpi_info.title: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO BTS FOR INTERACTIVE
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH reconfiguration failures for interactive NRT RB due to BTS reasons in SRNC in DL. UPDATED: When the BTS responds with NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or does not respond at all when DCH downlink reconfiguration is attempted.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO BTS FOR INTERACTIVE
